put.summary: This program is used add/change/delete basic data structure alt product text.
put.description: This program is used add/change/delete basic data structure alt product text. Program can be called in the following mode: *ADD Create structure alr product text. *CHANGE Update structure alt product text. *DELETE Delete structure alt product text. *NEXT Add or change depending on existence. Mandatory fields are 'Mode', 'parentItem' and 'AltProduct'

put.summary: This program is used add/change/delete basic data structure alternative product(s).
put.description: This program is used add/change/delete basic data structure alternative product(s). Program can be called in the following mode: *ADD Create structure alternative product. *CHANGE Update structure alternative product. *DELETE Delete structure alternative product. *NEXT Add or change depending on existence. Mandatory fields are 'Mode', 'parentItem' and 'AltProduct'

put.summary: This program is used add/change/delete basic data structure header text.
put.description: This program is used add/change/delete basic data structure header text. Program can be called in the following mode: *ADD Create structure header text. *CHANGE Update structure header text. *DELETE Delete structure header text. *NEXT Add or change depending on existence. Mandatory fields are 'Mode' and 'parentItem'

put.summary: This program is used add/change/delete basic data structure header.
put.description: This program is used add/change/delete basic data structure header. Program can be called in the following mode: *ADD Create structure header. *CHANGE Update structure header. *DELETE Delete structure. *NEXT Add or change depending on existence. Mandatory fields are 'Mode' and 'parentItem'.

put.summary: This program is used to do mass update or delete in basic data structures.
put.description: This program is used to do mass update or delete in basic data structures. Program can be called in the following selection: *COMP Component update. *WORKC Work centre update. *TOOL  Tool update. With the following update types. *EXCHANGE Exchange. *DELETE Delete. *UPDQTY Update component quantity. *UPDTME Update operation times.

put.summary: This program is used add/change/delete basic data structure material text.
put.description: This program is used add/change/delete basic data structure material text. Program can be called in the following mode: *ADD Create structure material text. *CHANGE Update structure material text. *DELETE Delete structure material text. *NEXT Add or change depending on existence. Mandatory fields are 'Mode', 'parentItem', 'sequenceNo' and 'componentItem'.

put.summary: This program is used add/change/delete basic data structure material record.
put.description: This program is used add/change/delete basic data structure material record. Program can be called in the following mode: *ADD Create structure material *CHANGE Update structure material *DELETE Delete material *NEXT Add or change depending on existence. Mandatory fields are 'Mode', 'parentItem', 'sequenceNo' and 'componentItem'.

put.summary: This program is used add/change/delete basic data structure operation text.
put.description: This program is used add/change/delete basic data structure operation text. Program can be called in the following mode: *ADD Create operation text. *CHANGE Update operation text. *DELETE Delete operation text. *NEXT Add or change depending on existence. Mandatory fields are 'Mode' and 'parentItem' and 'operationNumber'.

put.summary: This program is used add/change/delete basic data structure operation record.
put.description: This program is used add/change/delete basic data structure operation record. Program can be called in the following mode: *ADD Create structure operation *CHANGE Update structure operation *DELETE Delete operation *NEXT Add or change depending on existence. Mandatory fields are 'Mode', 'parentItem', and 'operationNumber'. NOTE!! If DC1 MFG control file field 'Op times in Min/Dec' = Minutes, then all the time field must be passed as HH,MM (hours, minutes).

put.summary: This program is used add/change/delete basic data structure operation tool record.
put.description: This program is used add/change/delete basic data structure operation tool record. Program can be called in the following mode: *ADD Create structure operation tool *DELETE Delete operation tool *NEXT Add or change depending on existence. Mandatory fields are 'Mode', 'parentItem', 'operationNumber' and 'tool'.
